skills_roles.title: MARKETING GURU
skills_roles.desc: Decades of successful creative and marketing initiatives have led to roles as Creative Director and VP Marketing. Startup experience honed my ability to quickly generate marketing that is compelling, extols value, clears objections and creates tribal loyalty. Successful marketing is timeless, iconic and is a measurable asset on a balance sheet.
skills_roles.skill_labels: Marketing Strategy, Content Strategy, Social Media Strategy, Brand Strategy, Creative Direction, Product Design, Lead Generation,Logotype Design, Graphic Design, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Audition, AfterEffects, Premiere Pro, Acrobat, Copywriting

skills_roles.title: UI/UX DESIGNER
skills_roles.desc: I’m a product driven UI/UX designer and developer with 25+ years of experience in web, mobile and gaming. Transcendent human centric design principles have yielded work with clarity, intuitive ease of use and utility.
skills_roles.skill_labels: UX customer research, competitive audit, Information Architecture, Journey Mapping, Wireframes, Prototyping, UI Design, UX Design, Usability Testing, Data Visualization, Animation

skills_roles.title: WEB DEVELOPER
skills_roles.desc: I’m a prooduct driven Full Stack Web Developer with 25+ years of experience. Agile DevOps, DB, Back End, APIs and Front End dev in multiple platforms and languages are part of my skillset. I've built products from concept to hardened completion.
skills_roles.skill_labels: HTML, CSS, SCSS, CSS-in-JS, JavaScript, TypeScript, JSX, jQuery, webpack, Angular, React, Vue, Unit Testing, GraphQL, API integration, API authoring, MySQL, Postgres, Firebase NoSQL, ElasticSearch, relational DB design, Python, NodeJS, Linnode, AWS (S3,EC2,CLI), Google Cloud Storage, npm, yarn, chron jobs

skills_roles.title: UNITY3D DEVELOPER
skills_roles.desc: I’m a product driven Unity3d developer with 15 years of experience who has shipped titles for Fortune 500 Clients, Gaming Companies, Cyber Security Companies and Higher Education. These projects were published to WebGL, iOS and Android. Most had back end API integration.
skills_roles.skill_labels: Augmented Reality, Application Architecture, Product Design, C#, .NET, Linq, MVC, Maya, 3D Modeling, UV Mapping, Shader Authoring, Unity3d, WebGL

portfolio.title: STARTUP - CYLIGENCE
portfolio.objective: Reposition cyber recon tooling for the M&A and MSSP markets. Attack surface scans yield PDF reports containing executive level overview and detailed analyst level content.
